Hello,

My iPhone 13 Pro is experiencing the following issue:

I ordered an iPhone 13 pro with a new battery and paid more for it.
Thank you for your help,

Once the package is received, the seller has 3 working days (5 if it's a laptop or home appliance) to replace or repair your product. Or, 2 working days to process a refund (if you're eligible).
A return is considered complete when the customer has met all the following conditions:
✔ Confirms that the product has not been repaired by a third party and has not suffered any damage as a result of a fall or exposure to water
✔ Confirms that personal data has been deleted
✔ Has confirmed having the return label.
✔ Understands they must include accessories and a proof of purchase in their package
✔ Understands they have 14 days to use the return label.
Remind: Once received, the seller has 3 working days (5 if it's a laptop or home appliance) to replace or repair your product. Or, 2 working days to process a refund (if you're eligible).

Hello ecomobile,

You have received the product for repair, the 27/05/2024. The delay to repair or exchange the product is 3 days for technical issue. 
Without an answer with a valid tracking link before the 03/06/2024 we will refund the customer.

Thank you for understanding,

Koami-Abraham from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately our repair team is unable to fix the issue and we have insufficient stocks available for an exchange. Instead we have fully refunded the customer. Thank you.

Regards,
CH
